name: Educational course (Frontend Development)
description: Completed full time course in front-end development
items: Introduction to the Web, HTML structure. Practice: creating a simple web page.
Formatting with CSS. Using external CSS style files. Practice: Text formatting with CSS.
Introduction to JavaScript. An object, Arrays. Object-oriented programming. Event handling. Browser Object Model. Document Object Model
React Framework. Building projects with Webpack and other tools.
